name: Lucid Dream Adventure
description:
Lucid Dream Adventure is an amazing point and click adventure game, that thousands of players around the world have come to love. Guide the fate of little Lucy and embark on a magical and dangerous journey to the world of dream, to save her mother. In this nominated for the most important indie prizes game, you will solve dozens of interesting puzzles and quests. You will talk to the mysterious characters living in dreamlands and show cunning and caution while travelling through the detailed levels of the surreal dream world.
Lucid Dream Adventure is a metaphorical tale of suffering, loss and regret that give way to the extraordinary power of love.

Why players love Lucid Dream Adventure:
• impresses with beautiful, hand-drawn graphics
• moves with a mysterious and addictive story
• enchants with evocative and original music

Briefly about the story:
In Lucid Dream Adventure you will play Lucy, a wheelchair-chained little girl, who looking for a cure for a terminally ill mother, embarks on an adventurous journey through the colourful and surreal world of dream. It only depends on you if her mission is successful. During the journey you will be accompanied by a Oneiromancer, a mysterious dreams interpreter. Who is he and what are his real intentions? Find out and start a wonderful journey with Lucid Dream Adventure. During your travel you will visit, among others:
• the extraordinary planet of Oneiromancer will face the greatest fears
• an abandoned Desert of Time, where the past mixes with the present
• the mysterious World Eyes, where you set off on a stellar journey

Why Lucid Dream Adventure:
The well-balanced level of difficulty, original aesthetics and universal values that Lucid Dream Adventure provides, has made the game recognized by thousands of players around the world, and was also noticed by the jury of many international competitions for indie game developers. Players especially appreciate:
• 10 unique and carefully refined dream regions
• addictive gameplay, full of interesting puzzles and quests
• beautiful, hand-drawn graphics
• an extraordinary and moving story, full of twists and turns
• original soundtrack
Join thousands of satisfied players and try your luck in the world of Lucid Dream Adventure. Little Lucy counts on your help!

About Dali Games:
We are a small indie studio. Our mission is to create games that use interesting gameplay to bring about fast social problems. We believe that computer games should change the world. They reach a wide audience and can lead to reflection, which is why they are a fantastic medium for transferring universal values. We want to follow these principles by creating exciting games for you, that will remain in your memory for a long time.
